subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James and Chris Bosh each finished with 19 points and 9 rebounds and the Miami Heat extended their home winning streak to 15 with a 106-85 victory over the Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: LeBron James and Chris Bosh each finished with 19 points and 9 rebounds and the Miami Heat extended their home winning streak to 15 with a 106-85 victory over the Dallas Mavericks.
